title: Transformers Comics Part 1 (Marvel, Dreamwave, Devil's Due, and
description:
Transformers Comics Part 1 (Marvel, Dreamwave, Devil's Due, and 3H)


Collected here are all of the Transformers comics from Marvel (1984-1995), Dreamwave (2002-2004), Devil's Due (2003-2007), and 3H (1997-2004), as well as the IDW Marvel reprints.

I have another torrent which collects the comics from IDW (2005-ongoing), Funpub (2005-ongoig), and miscellaneous other comics & reference works.

The issues are sorted into folders based on which continuity-family they belong to and then numbered into a reading order based mostly on publication date.

Some folders have subfolders named "(Alternatives)" or "(Trades)" that contain alternative scans or digital trade paperback collections of some of the issues in the parent folder. If this duplication bothers you, don't download the files in the various "(Alternatives)" and "(Trades)" folders unless you are dissatisfied with the content or quality of the primary copies.

Thanks to all of the writers, artists, editors and support staff at Marvel, Dreamwave, Devil's Due, 3H, and IDW (and any other shop I missed) who worked on these comics.

Thanks to all the other uploaders I got these files from, in particular: thesergesasasa, ZINC, nemesis43, Hagetaka, soundx, and ThatTFAnon.

I'm on a relatively slow connection, so it will take at least a couple days for me to upload the entire thing. Please be patient and stick around to seed.

======================================================
(1984-1994) Marvel US:
======================================================
The Transformers US #1-80
G.I. Joe and the Transformers #1-4
Headmasters #1-4
G.I. Joe #138-142
US Generation 2 #1-12
+ Transformers: The Movie #1-3
+ Transformers: Universe #1-4

======================================================
(1984-1995) Marvel UK:
======================================================
The Transformers UK #1-332
The Transformers UK Annuals 1986-1992
Action Force #24-27
UK Generation 2 #1-5
UK Generation 2 Annual

Summer Special
 [includes an Energon story too]
Micromasters #1-4
War Within, v3 #1-3
+ More than Meets the Eye #1-8

Armada #0-18
Armada FCBD
Energon #19-30
+ Armada Mini-Comic #1-4
+ Energon Mini-Comic #1-4
+ More than Meets the Eye: Armada #1-3

(2003-2004) Dreamwave Transformers/G.I. Joe:

Visitations

+ 3H Collector's Club Magazine #1

The Transformers Classics, v1-7

G.I. Joe/Transformers, v1

              Space Pirates, Time Wars,
              City of Fear, and Prey
